author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

According to Joy Behar, Trump doesn’t like AOC because she doesn’t compliment him and is allegedly a strong woman. But what doesn’t make sense is—why would anyone like someone who only insults them? You don’t have to be Donald Trump to get that, but that’s neither here nor there.

Joy Behar on Trump's feud with AOC: "He really doesn't like strong women. He likes dutiful, obedient women, who compliment him."

Susie Wiles, Kristi Noem, Pam Bondi, and Karoline Leavitt (to name a few) would like a word. pic.twitter.com/KzSJVTVBDK
— Townhall.com (@townha
title: Joy Behar on Trump-AOC Feud: “He Doesn’t Like Strong Women—Only Ones Who Compliment Him”

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
There’s a reason this country voted for mass deportation: to remove criminal aliens from the streets. It’s not surprising that the same side that believes no human is illegal, regardless of crimes committed, also supports some of the worst offenders. And it’s stories like this that are exactly why Americans made their voices heard in November.

The Vice Mayor of Cudahy, CA, Cynthia Gonzalez, has made reprehensible remarks encouraging criminal gangs like the 18th Street gang to target ICE law enforcement officers. What makes this even more ironic is that she is openly supporting lawlessness at the expense of the safety of federal officers who are working to uphold the law.

title: Unhinged Democrat Mayor calls for street gangs to fight ICE and stop deportations

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Many customers have complained that stores like Target are removing self-checkout, forcing them to wait in long lines for a cashier. And it’s because of people like State Rep. Raghib Allie-Brennan—who was caught stealing—that you can’t have your cake and eat it too.

Connecticut Dem Allie-Brennan was arrested for shoplifting after claiming he “was in a rush to bring items to my grandmother in the hospital, the store didn’t have bags, and [he] was juggling multiple purchases.”

What's even
title: Democrat official gets busted shoplifting from Target, and it's not the first time

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
President Trump shut down Iran’s nuclear program and helped get a ceasefire between Israel and Iran. CNN is so upset about it; their reporting is worse than usual. Today’s show breaks it down.

"How can anyone be upset about that?" Crowder said.

Per a Truth Social post from the POTUS:

FAKE NEWS CNN, TOGETHER WITH THE FAI
title: Watch: CNN is SEETHING of Trump successful foreign policy, so here comes the fake news

author: Brodigan
description:
President Donald Trump knocked out the Iranian nuclear program and has established a ceasefire between Israel and Iran and CNN is mad about it. So mad that they’re reporting is worse than normal. Senator Bernie Sanders appeared on Joe Rogan and it doesn’t seem as though it went the way he planned. We bring you the highlights. The New York City mayoral primary was yesterday. Good news! Andrew Cuomo lost. Bad news: the guy who won might be somehow worse.

CNN SEETHING

  • Exclusive: US strikes on Iran did not destroy nuclear sites, sources sa
title: 🔴 Watch! Big Winning: Trump's Iran Victory Makes CNN, AOC, and the Entire Left Absolutely Decompose

author: Brodigan
description:
To paraphrase Tobey Ziegler, I'd like to caution my friends on the right against tempting the wrath of the whatever from high atop the thing. It's fun to have fun at the expense of New York City now that they (unofficially) elected an extremist and socialist like Zohran Mamdani as mayor. Theoretically, the suburbs will be popping red pills when they see him turn NYC into what Brandon Johnson is turning Chicago into. Still, let's not tempt fate by celebrating too much.

That is not to say we can't have some fun today, as America's #1 Bluesky troll JD Vance did. He couldn't wait to congratulate The Zohran on becoming the national leader of the Democrat Party.

VP JD Vance congratulates Zohran Mamdani as "the new leader of the Democratic Party" on Bluesky.
title: JD Vance can't wait to hop on BlueSky, trolls leftists now that an Islamic Socialist became the new leader of the Democrat Party

author: Brodigan
description:
Social media influencers have created a lucrative industry pretending they are something they aren't for the sake of clicks and engagement. Take social media influencer Rep. AOC, for example. She creates political content while claiming to be from the gritty inner city, when in reality, like most poseurs who claim they are city folk, she's actually from the upper-middle-class suburbs. That's been further exposed when her "tough girl" routine about beating up Donald Trump led to her high school yearbook being uncovered.

Rep. AOC, through her side hustle as a member of Congress (where she represents Washington DC), called for Donald Trump to be impeached, again, for... whatever silly reason the billionaire oligarchs who control the Democrat Party came up with. Trump, as the kids say, "clapped back," calling the "stupid" social media inf
title: AOC claims she'll beat up Trump because she's "from the Bronx," then her yearbook photo exposes where she's REALLY from
